Format Alerts
Count Array size / Set email title
func:
msg.topic = "GrowBox report"; //Email title
flow.set("SendEmail",false); //Reset email sending flag
msg.ActiveAlertsSize = flow.get('ActiveAlerts').length;  //Count active alerts array size
msg.RecoveredAlertsSize = flow.get('RecoveredAlerts').length; //Count resolved alerts array size



return msg;
